title: World’s Central Banks Increasingly Look to Fed for Top Hires
description: From Istanbul to Rome, central banks with senior vacancies are embracing the pedigree that comes with a career spent in US policymaking.
content: From Istanbul to Rome, central banks with senior vacancies are embracing the pedigree that comes with a career spent in US policymaking.
